name: Activity Feed
description: Display a list of recent activities performed by an individual, typically on a single website.

name: Add Friends or Followers
description: A feature for the user to add friends or followers to their network.

name: Broadcast Message
description: A feature to broadcast a message to multiple users at the same time.

name: Chat
description: Basic peer to peer chat functionality.

name: Chat Backup and Restore
description: Ability to restore previous chats or backup current chats.

name: Comments
description: Ability to view and post comments. This also includes nested (up to one level) replies feature.

name: Contact Sharing
description: Allows the users to send information about their contacts.

name: Conversation Threading
description: Allowing bulletin boards, newsgroups, and forums to have a visual grouping of messages with their replies.

name: Emojis
description: Emoji integration within chat and posts.

name: Event Registration
description: Enable users to register for an event listed on your platform.

name: Face Tagging
description: Automatically identifies faces in images and allow users to tag them.

name: Friend or Follower List
description: A list of friends and followers with the option to search and filter.

name: GIFs
description: GIF integration within chat and posts.

name: Group Chat
description: Allows users to chat with up to 16 friend.

name: Hashtags
description: A feature to make it easier for users to find messages matching a particular theme or content.

name: Karma Points
description: A feature which alllows users to earn online points with good quality submissions and comments.

name: Likes
description: A feature that allows users to like a photo, video or post.

name: Live Feed Capture
description: A feature to capture live feed activity.

name: Live Feed Scheduling
description: A feature to schedule the capturing of live feed activity.

name: Live Streaming
description: A feature to add live streaming to broadcast your live event.

name: Mentions
description: Allows users to reference or link a user's profile to a post or a comment.

name: Mute Unmute
description: Allow users to mute or unmute messages from selected conversation.

name: Nearby Friends
description: Allow users to find nearby contacts using geolocation.

name: Post Creation
description: Enabling users to post text only status updates, tag location, friends and upload media.

name: Repost
description: Allow users to repost content onto their feed.

name: Share
description: Ability to share content via different social media networks or email.

name: Stories
description: Allows users to share photos and videos which disappear after 24 hours.

name: Trending
description: Helps users discover interesting and relevant topics being discussed on the platform.

name: Upload Media
description: Ability to upload pictures, documents and videos.

name: Upvote and Downvote
description: Allow users to like/dislike content in order to control its overall visibility.
